info.description: Watch Hive is an E-commerce platform to purchase Watch
info.title: Go + Gin E-Commerce API Watch Hive

post.description: Authenticate an admin and get access token

400.description: Invalid request or constraints not satisfied
Bad request: Fields provided in the wrong format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not retrieve categories

post.description: Adds a new category based on the provided details.

400.description: Bad request: Fields are provided in the wrong format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not add the category

delete.description: Deletes a category based on the provided category ID.

400.description: Bad request: Fields are not provided in the correct format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not delete the category

patch.description: Updates the name of an existing category based on the provided details.

parameters.description: Current and New category name details
parameters.name: SetNewName

400.description: Bad request: Fields provided in the wrong format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not update the category name

get.description: Retrieves sales report for the specified time period
get.summary: Retrieve current sales report for a specific time period

400.description: Invalid request or unable to retrieve dashboard

get.description: Retrieves all order details for admin with pagination based on the provided parameters.
get.summary: Retrieve all order details for admin

200.description: Success: Retrieved all order details for admin successfully

400.description: Bad request: Page number or count not in correct format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not retrieve order details for admin

delete.description: Cancels an order based on the provided order ID from an admin perspective.

500.description: Internal server error: Error from orderID or couldn't cancel the order

patch.description: Approves an order based on the provided order ID.

400.description: Bad request: Error from orderID or couldn't approve the order

500.description: Internal server error: Failed to approve the order

post.description: Adds a new payment method using the provided details.

parameters.description: Details of the new payment method
parameters.name: NewPaymentMethod

400.description: Bad request: Cannot add payment method or payment name error

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of products.

400.description: Bad request: Product display error

post.description: Adds a new product using the provided details and image.

400.description: Bad request: Retrieving image error or could not add the product

delete.description: Deletes an existing product by the provided ID.

400.description: Bad request: Product ID provided in wrong format or deletion error

patch.description: Updates an existing product using the provided details.

400.description: Bad request: Fields are in the wrong format or could not edit the product

patch.description: Updates the stock of an existing product using the provided details.

400.description: Bad request: Fields provided in wrong format or could not update the product stock

get.description: Retrieves sales report data between the provided start and end dates.
get.summary: Generate sales report by date range

400.description: Bad request: Start or end date is empty

500.description: Internal server error: Sales report could not be retrieved

get.description: Retrieves users based on the provided page number

400.description: Invalid request or unable to retrieve users

patch.description: Blocks a user based on the provided ID

400.description: Failed to block user

patch.description: Unblocks a user based on the provided ID

400.description: Invalid request or unable to unblock user

delete.description: Removes a product from the user's cart based on the provided details.

parameters.description: Product details to remove from cart
parameters.name: RemoveFromCart

200.description: Success: Product removed from cart successfully

400.description: Bad request: Cannot remove product or fields are provided in the wrong format

500.description: Internal server error: Removing from cart failed

get.description: Retrieves the list of items in the user's cart based on the user ID.

400.description: Bad request: Cannot list products

500.description: Internal server error: Could not get the cart list

post.description: Adds an item to the user's cart based on the provided details.

parameters.description: Item details to add to the cart
parameters.name: AddCart

200.description: Success: Item added to cart successfully

400.description: Bad request: Fields are provided in the wrong format

500.description: Internal server error: Cannot add item to cart

patch.description: Updates the quantity of a product in the user's cart based on the provided details.

400.description: Bad request: Cannot update quantity or fields are provided in the wrong format

post.description: Handles user login using provided credentials

400.description: Invalid request or unable to log in user

get.description: Retrieves order details for a user based on the provided pagination parameters.

400.description: Bad request: Page number or count not in correct format

500.description: Internal server error: Could not retrieve order details

post.description: Places an order with items from the user's cart based on the provided details.

400.description: Bad request: Error in getting ID or bad request

500.description: Internal server error: Could not place the order

delete.description: Cancels an order based on the provided order ID for the logged-in user.

400.description: Bad request: Error from orderID or error from userid

500.description: Internal server error: Could not cancel the order

patch.description: Initiates the return process for an order based on the provided order ID and user ID.

400.description: Bad request: Error from orderID or error from userid

500.description: Internal server error: Couldn't initiate the order return

get.description: Processes the checkout for the user's order.

400.description: Bad request: Getting user ID failed

post.description: Sends an OTP (One-Time Password) to the provided phone number for verification.

400.description: Bad request: Fields provided in wrong format or OTP not sent

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of products available for users.

200.description: Success: Products for users displayed successfully

400.description: Bad request: Product display error

get.description: Retrieves details of the user identified by ID

400.description: Invalid request or unable to get user details

patch.description: Updates user profile details based on provided information

400.description: Invalid request or unable to update user profile

post.description: Adds an address for the user identified by ID

400.description: Invalid request or constraints not satisfied

get.description: Retrieves all addresses of the user identified by ID

400.description: Invalid request or unable to get user addresses

patch.description: Changes the password for the user identified by ID

400.description: Invalid request or unable to change password

post.description: Registers a new user with provided details

400.description: Invalid request or constraints not satisfied

post.description: Verifies the provided OTP (One-Time Password) code for user authentication.

400.description: Bad request: Fields provided are in wrong format or could not verify OTP

get.description: Retrieves wallet details for a specific user.

400.description: Bad request: User ID not found or invalid user ID type

500.description: Internal server error: Failed to retrieve wallet details
